Class CardDeck

java.lang.Object
  CardDeck

public class CardDeck
extends java.lang.Object

CardDeck represents a single deck of 52 Cards

Version:
(a version number or a date)
Author:
Lisa Miyamoto

Constructor Summary
CardDeck()
          Construct a deck of 52 cards with Aces given a cardRank > Kings
CardDeck(int numDecks, boolean aceHigh)
          Construct numDecks number of decks of 52 cards.
 
Method Summary
 Card deal()
          randomly return a Card from the deck that has not yet been dealt/used
 int getNumUnusedCards()
          returns how many cards have not yet been dealt/used
 void showAllCardsGraphically()
          uses TextWriter to display all the cards in the deck graphically
 void showAllCardsSystemOut()
          uses System.out to display all the cards in the deck
 void shuffle()
          resets all the Cards in the deck to a status of NOT yet used/dealt

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

CardDeck

public CardDeck()
Construct a deck of 52 cards with Aces given a cardRank > Kings

CardDeck

public CardDeck(int numDecks,
                boolean aceHigh)
Construct numDecks number of decks of 52 cards. If aceHigh is true, Aces will be given a cardRank of 14 (higher than Kings 13) otherwise their cardRank will be 1.

Parameters:
numDecks - the number of 52 card decks you want included in this deck
aceHigh - set to true for Aces valued higher than Kings or false to set them less than a 2
Method Detail

deal

public Card deal()
randomly return a Card from the deck that has not yet been dealt/used

returns how many cards have not yet been dealt/used

uses TextWriter to display all the cards in the deck graphically

showAllCardsSystemOut

public void showAllCardsSystemOut()
uses System.out to display all the cards in the deck

shuffle

public void shuffle()
resets all the Cards in the deck to a status of NOT yet used/dealt
